title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2051.5 - Amendments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2051.5 - Amendments

State Regulations

These regulations may be amended by resolution of the board
of directors of the corporation, provided that the president, upon written
notice to the board of directors, may from time to time amend nonmaterial
portions of these regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2051.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
